venue.address_1: corner Park Ave and Salisbury St.
venue.name: Institute Park

item.description:
We'll be helping clean up the Institute Park area of Worcester with another group. I'm sorry for the late update. I'll be there around 7:40 am, I'll have a black jacket and jeans on. I'm not sure where the other group is congregating. But we'll figure it out.

_______________________________________________________

REC is a grassroots environmental justice organization located in Worcester, Massachusetts--New England's second largest city. Founded in 1971, REC has been dedicated to building healthy, sustainable and just communities in Worcester and beyond for almost 40 years.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the other volunteers
item.why: The Earth needs our help. We messed it up after all...
item.name: Help Clean Up Worcester! Earth Day Volunteering.
